title: "fonts are clothing for words"
content: Who said "fonts are clothing for words"? Somebody famous? [Cavanaugh](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080251/http:/www.fontsite.com/Pages/WritingStyle/W&S1297.html) says Beatrice Warde, but it doesn't very Wardesque to me.
author: Stephen Coles

comments.content: I think it's Warde paraphrased. I think she said something like "the clothes they (words) wear". Trying to find where I saw it now.

"People who love ideas must have a love of words, and that means, given a chance they will take a vivid interest in the clothes which words wear." —Beatrice Warde

IndieFonts 2, pg 634, in the Parkinson Type Design section
Jimmy P is proof enough for me. Thanks Karen!
